name: Wizord
description:
WASD - Move

Space - Shoot

Collect keys to open doors. Collect coins to increase your score. But watch out for Goblins! If they touch you they will steal your score. Shoot them with your magic missiles. Can you be the greatest Wizord in the land of Majestia?

Presented completely soundless, to replicate the experience of playing it under your desk in class and you don't want the teacher to see you.

Made for Nokia Game Jam 3
